title: KLN Clinches Dual Titles at 2025 AFLAS Awards
description: KLN Logistics Group Limited ('KLN'; Stock Code 0636.HK) has once again solidified its industry dominance by winning two prestigious accolades at the 2025 Asian Freight, Logistics and Supply Chain Awards ('AFLAS Awards') last night. KLN was named Best 3PL Provider for the tenth consecutive year, reaffirming its unmatched expertise in global logistics, and also took home Best Logistics Service Provider - Sea for the fourth time, underscoring its commanding position in ocean freight.
content:
Crowned Best 3PL Provider for Tenth Straight Year 

and Best Logistics Service Provider - Sea for the Fourth Time

HONG KONG, Sept. 4, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- KLN Logistics Group Limited ('KLN'; Stock Code 0636.HK) has once again solidified its industry dominance by winning two prestigious accolades at the 2025 Asian Freight, Logistics and Supply Chain Awards ('AFLAS Awards') last night. KLN was named Best 3PL Provider for the tenth consecutive year, reaffirming its unmatched expertise in global logistics, and also took home Best Logistics Service Provider - Sea for the fourth time, underscoring its commanding position in ocean freight.

Samuel Lau, Managing Director - Integrated Logistics Asia of KLN, said, "To be recognised once again by the AFLAS Awards and to mark a decade of leadership in global logistics is a proud moment for our entire team. These awards reflect the trust our customers place in us, the resilience of our global network, and our commitment to delivering agile, sustainable logistics solutions. In a year marked by supply chain volatility, our continued recognition reinforces KLN's role as a stabilising force and strategic partner in global commerce."

Deepak Saxena, Managing Director - South Asia, Global Ocean & Agency of KLN, added, "These honours come on the heels of KLN's continued reign as the No.1 Trans-Pacific non-vessel operating common carrier ('NVOCC') from Asia to the US, from 2022 through the first half of 2025. This recognition reflects our unmatched scale, operational reliability, and customer-centric innovation across global trade lanes. It also underscores the strength of our ocean freight capabilities and the trust placed in us by leading brands navigating complex international markets."

Organised by Asia Cargo News since 1986, the AFLAS Awards honour excellence across shipping, air cargo, logistics and supply chain sectors in the Asia Pacific. Winners are selected by over 15,000 readers, representing the collective voice of industry professionals and customers.

KLN (formerly Kerry Logistics Network Limited) is an Asia-based, global 3PL with a highly diversified business portfolio and extensive coverage in Asia. It offers a broad range of supply chain solutions from integrated logistics, international freight forwarding (air, ocean, road, rail and multimodal) and e-commerce to industrial project logistics and infrastructure investment.

With a global presence across 59 countries and territories, KLN has established a solid foothold in half of the world's emerging markets. Its diverse infrastructure, extensive coverage in international gateways and local expertise span across the Mainland of China, India, Southeast Asia, the CIS, Middle East, LATAM and other locations.
summary: KLN Logistics Group Limited (KlN) has won two prestigious accolades at the 2025 Asian Freight, Logistics and Supply Chain Awards, including Best 3PL Provider for the tenth consecutive year and Best Logistics Service Provider - Sea for the fourth time. The awards recognise KLN's unmatched expertise in global logistics and its position in ocean freight. Samuel Lau, Managing Director - Integrated Logistics Asia of KLN, described the recognition as a proud moment for his team and reflecting the trust our customers place in them and commitment to delivering agile, sustainable logistics solutions. The AFLAS Awards, organised by Asia Cargo News since 1986, recognise excellence across shipping, air cargo, logistics and supply chain sectors in the Asia Pacific.
shortSummary: KLN Logistics Group secured dual awards at the 2025 AFLAS Awards, including Best 3PL Provider for the tenth year and Best Logistics Service for the fourth time.
argos_summary: KLN Logistics Group Limited secured two awards at the 2025 Asian Freight, Logistics and Supply Chain Awards, being named Best 3PL Provider for the tenth consecutive year and Best Logistics Service Provider – Sea for the fourth time. The accolades underscore KLN’s dominance in global logistics and ocean freight, highlighting its resilience amid supply chain volatility. The company’s extensive network across 59 countries and its role as a leading Trans-Pacific NVOCC reinforce its position as a stabilising force in international trade.
